price: 8. Allah! Geen heeft het recht om aanbeden te worden behalve Hij! Hem behoren de mooiste Namen toe.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ لَهُ ٱلۡأَسۡمَآءُ ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu lā ilāha illā huwa lahu al-asmāu al-ḥus'nā
